resources.string: To the hive of Aguafrias came a stranger one grim day Hardly spoke to the Arbites, didn\'t have too much to say No one dared to slit his purse\-strings, no one dared to make a slip for the black-clad man among them had a boltgun on his hip Boltgun on his hip.
This app was written by William Counihan. It has taken hours and refuses to work, SQLite is a pain.
